name: Advisory for early-stage startups
body:
# Consulting services

As an independent consultant, I help early-stage digital startups with the following

## Business advisory
* Formulating and optimizing value proposition
* Outlining business development strategy
* Improving content of landing pages and other marketing materials for better UX and value-focused product messaging 
* Organizing content for investor pitch decks

## Technical advisory:
* High-level software architecture design _(fault tolerance, continuous integration and delivery, high availability)_
* Ad-hoc consultancy on Docker, Ansible, Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery, DevOps, data processing, infrastructure automation and security.
* Organising and supervising work of the engineering team
* Interim CTO, part-time _(all the above plus technical strategy, research, biz-tech brainstorming and copywriting, and many more things normally done by technical cofounderâ€¦ until you find one)_.

# About me
My experience includes 10+ years of building SaaS and data processing solutions for different companies in various roles (from software engineer to project manager with architectural duties).  

As a founding team member of [Conjur.net](http://conjur.net) (from 2013 to 2015) I obtained a sound experience of early-stage startup business development and technical marketing. 

Currently, I am working as a business and technical consultant for a number of early-stage startups, and also act as a CTO at [InnMind.com](http://innmind.com).
